title: Sunny Health & Fitness Fully Adjustable Power Zone

product_features.name: Transpity wheels for easy storage and portability

short_description: This adjustable power zone provides adjustable and customizable options so you can stay comfortable while challenging your body! This weight bench has 7 adjustable positions（-20°, 0°, 15°, 30°, 45°, 60°, 85°) for a variety of workout options. A 7 level backrest, a 4 level seat and 3 level foam rollers allow for a highly...
